features.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4050 6GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2370MHz, TGP 95W
features.Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
features.Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Gaming Audio
features.Ports:
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Power connector
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
2x USB 3.2 Gen 2
